# 1. Green-AI Cognitive Pipeline
<span class="tech-tag">Local LLM (Mistral)</span> <span class="tech-tag">Neo4j</span> <span class="tech-tag">LangGraph</span> <span class="tech-tag">Energy-Aware</span>

The "Flagship" Local Agent. This system replaces cloud APIs with a quantized local model to reduce carbon footprint and ensure data privacy.

* **Key Innovation:** A "Real-Time Energy Router" that measures the exact Joules per token.
* **Architecture:** ReAct Agent switching between Graph (Structured) and Vector (Unstructured) memory.

# 2. Eco Sentry: Cognitive Edge Security
<span class="tech-tag">TinyLlama-1.1B</span> <span class="tech-tag">ChromaDB</span> <span class="tech-tag">Docker</span>

A "Cognitive Firewall" running on the Edge Node.

* **Problem:** Traditional firewalls are rigid; Cloud SIEM is slow/expensive.
* **Solution:** A local Vector Database (ChromaDB) learns traffic patterns. Anomalies trigger a local TinyLlama agent to explain *why* the packet is dangerous.

::: {.panel-tabset}

# 3. Civic Pulse Monitor (Smart City Ops)
<span class="tech-tag">Ollama (Llama 3)</span> <span class="tech-tag">Neo4j</span> <span class="tech-tag">PyDeck</span>

A privacy-first Smart City architecture running entirely offline.

* **Problem:** Traditional systems treat civic reports as context-blind rows.
* **Solution:** Federates structured logs with unstructured geospatial data, utilizing local Llama 3 inference and graph logic to autonomously identify high-priority hazards.
